name: RoboTechs
description:
RoboTechs

Join the adventures of two brave and cunning robotic drones, trying to collect gears that are scattered around a maze-like, sci-fi research facility. What devices will they stumble upon as they delve deeper and deeper into the laboratory? Two players are recommended, though you might try playing it by yourself if you have no friends. 

This game has been made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021. 

Controls:

Player 1 - WSAD, E for action
Player 2 - Arrows, control for action

Full screen recommended
